alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Orange; Rutland; Washington; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:57PM EDT until July 13 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Orange County in central Vermont... South central Caledonia County in northeastern Vermont... East central Rutland County in southern Vermont... Windsor County in southern Vermont... Southeastern Washington County in central Vermont... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 657 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Irasville to near South Wallingford, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barre, Chester, Woodstock, Braintree Hill, Bradford, Orange, Thetford Hill State Park, Ludlow Village, Websterville, Pomfret, Plymouth, Thetford, Hartland, Fairlee, Tunbridge, Sharon, Corinth Corners, Washington, Ryegate, and Newbury. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
